namespace.select:
select a.* from resource as a
a.AggregateId = @AggregateId
a.GroupSort = @GroupSort
a.GroupSort in (@GroupSortArray)
namespace.update: update resource set Version = Version + 1, ActionDescn = @ActionDescn, EditDate = @EditDate, Editor = @Editor where AggregateId = @AggregateId;

update.ifarray: update resource set Version = Version + 1, GroupSort = @GroupSort, ActionDescn = @ActionDescn, EditDate = @EditDate, Editor = @Editor where AggregateId = @AggregateId;
